notesShort: D-Tilt beats this character, spam it.
Dash attack beats this character if he tries to camp D-Tilt.
Dimensional Cape has no lag, but the slash has a billion lag. Have a lethal punish prepared for when Cape Slash hits your shield.
Meta Knight struggles to contest us for setting up on him with spaced N-Airs. Abuse N-Air in place to slow the game pace down and force him to take risks to contest us.
Read Uzair's [Meta Knight Write-Up](https://drive.google.com/file/d/1St8jVJJLmoMbJSweoNqUqksGSRA-CjbF/view) for more details.

fsmash.notes: At some ranges, F-Smash 1 also connects.
